GSD.product_version: versions from v4.2 to before v5.10.132
GSD.description:
sfc: fix kernel panic when creating VF

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.132 by commit b82e4ad58a7fb72456503958a93060f87896e629, it was introduced in version v4.2 by commit d778819609a27efd5358da8151a0ad3507243e19. For more details please see the references link.
